hooks.command: echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] PostToolUse Hook Triggered - Tool: $TOOL_NAME, File: $TOOL_FILE_PATH" >> "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/outputs/hook_log.txt; if [[ "$TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *"ir.json" ]]; then echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Running IRProcessor on ir.json" >> "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/outputs/hook_log.txt; PYTHONPATH="$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR:$PYTHONPATH" python3 "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/pipeline/IRProcessor.py "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/outputs/ir.json examples.division >> "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/outputs/hook_log.txt 2>&1; fi
